double-slap.name: Double Slap
double-slap.description: Hit 2 times for 6 damage each. (Front row).

comet-punch.description: Hit 2 times for 6 damage each. (Front row).

fury-attack.description: Hit 3 times for 2 damage each. (Front row).

fury-swipes.description: Hit 3 times for 3 damage each. (Front row).

spike-cannon.name: Spike Cannon
spike-cannon.description: Hit 4 times for 4 damage each. (Front row).

barrage.name: Barrage
barrage.description: Hit 4 times for 4 damage each. (Front row).

thrash.name: Thrash
thrash.description: Deal 18 damage. Add 1 Echo (half damage) to hand. Gain Fatigue 2. Vanish. (Front row).

self-destruct.name: Self Destruct
self-destruct.description: Deal 38 damage to all enemies. User faints.

explosion.name: Explosion
explosion.description: Deal 56 damage to all enemies. User faints.

super-fang.name: Super Fang
super-fang.description: Deal damage equal to 50% of target's current HP.

guillotine.name: Guillotine
guillotine.description: Deal damage equal to 75% of target's max HP. Vanish.

horn-drill.name: Horn Drill
horn-drill.description: Deal damage equal to 75% of target's max HP. Vanish.

twineedle.name: Twineedle
twineedle.description: Hit 2 times for 4 damage each. Apply Poison 1. (Front row).

pin-missile.name: Pin Missile
pin-missile.description: Hit 4 times for 4 damage each. (Front row).

leech-life.name: Leech Life
leech-life.description: Deal 7 damage. Heal 50% of damage dealt.

double-kick.name: Double Kick
double-kick.description: Hit 2 times for 6 damage each. (Front row).

rolling-kick.name: Rolling Kick
rolling-kick.description: Deal 6 damage to all enemies in a column.

flamethrower.name: Flamethrower
flamethrower.description: Deal 14 damage to all enemies in a column.

hex.name: Hex
hex.description: Deal 12 damage plus 2 per debuff stack on the target.

absorb.name: Absorb
absorb.description: Deal 3 damage. Heal 50% of damage dealt.

mega-drain.name: Mega Drain
mega-drain.description: Deal 7 damage. Heal 50% of damage dealt.

giga-drain.name: Giga Drain
giga-drain.description: Deal 33 damage. Heal 50% of damage dealt.

horn-leech.name: Horn Leech
horn-leech.description: Deal 14 damage. Heal 50% of damage dealt.

bullet-seed.name: Bullet Seed
bullet-seed.description: Hit 3 times for 5 damage each. (Front row).

grass-knot.name: Grass Knot
grass-knot.description: Deal 22 damage. Deals more to heavier targets (up to x2).

leaf-storm.name: Leaf Storm
leaf-storm.description: Deal 39 damage. Apply Enfeeble 6 to self. Vanishes.

strength-sap.name: Strength Sap
strength-sap.description: Deal 16 damage. Heal 50% of damage dealt. Apply Enfeeble 3. Vanishes.

frenzy-plant.name: Frenzy Plant
frenzy-plant.description: Deal 45 damage. Apply Fatigue 3 to self.

flower-trick.name: Flower Trick
flower-trick.description: Deal 12 damage. Copy an Echo of the target's top card. (Front row).

bonemerang.name: Bonemerang
bonemerang.description: Hit 2 times for 6 damage each. (Front row).

fissure.name: Fissure
fissure.description: Deal damage equal to 50% of target's max HP. Vanish.

dream-eater.name: Dream Eater
dream-eater.description: Deal 18 damage. Heal 50% of damage dealt.

rest.name: Rest
rest.description: Heal 50% of max HP. Gain Sleep 2. Vanish.

rock-slide.name: Rock Slide
rock-slide.description: Deal 12 damage to entire front row.

razor-shell.name: Razor Shell
razor-shell.description: Deal 7 damage. Apply Enfeeble 1. (Front only, contact).

muddy-water.name: Muddy Water
muddy-water.description: Deal 12 damage to the front row.

wave-crash.name: Wave Crash
wave-crash.description: Deal 48 damage. Take 33% recoil. (Front only, contact).

flip-turn.name: Flip Turn
flip-turn.description: Deal 9 damage. Draw 1 card. (Front only, contact).

brine.name: Brine
brine.description: Deal 14 damage. +8 if target is below half HP.

water-spout.name: Water Spout
water-spout.description: Deal up to 35 damage to all enemies. Scales with user HP. Vanish.

fake-out.name: Fake Out
fake-out.description: Deal 2 damage. Apply Slow 3. (Front row). Vanish.

discharge.name: Discharge
discharge.description: Deal 5 damage to all enemies. Apply Paralysis 1.

silver-wind.name: Silver Wind
silver-wind.description: Deal 8 damage to all enemies. Gain Strength 1.

flail.name: Flail
flail.description: Deal 8 damage. Deal 16 instead if below 50% HP. (Front row).

dual-chop.name: Dual Chop
dual-chop.description: Hit 2 times for 3 damage each. (Front row).

breaking-swipe.name: Breaking Swipe
breaking-swipe.description: Deal 10 damage to front row. Apply Enfeeble 1.

scale-shot.name: Scale Shot
scale-shot.description: Hit 4 times for 5 damage each. Gain Haste 2.

clanging-scales.name: Clanging Scales
clanging-scales.description: Deal 17 damage to all enemies. Gain Slow 2 and Enfeeble 3.

outrage.name: Outrage
outrage.description: Deal 33 damage. Add 2 Echoes (half damage) to hand. Gain Fatigue 3. Vanish.

dragon-energy.name: Dragon Energy
dragon-energy.description: Deal 35 damage to all enemies, scaled by current HP %. Vanish.

potion.name: Potion
potion.description: Heal an ally for 15 HP. Single use.

super-potion.name: Super Potion
super-potion.description: Heal an ally for 30 HP. Single use.

full-heal.name: Full Heal
full-heal.description: Remove up to 3 debuffs from an ally. Single use.

x-attack.name: X Attack
x-attack.description: Give an ally 3 Strength. Single use.

dire-hit.name: Dire Hit
dire-hit.description: Give an ally 5 Strength. Draw 1 card. Single use.

x-defend.name: X Defend
x-defend.description: Give an ally 10 Block. Single use.

guard-spec.name: Guard Spec.
guard-spec.description: Give an ally 3 Evasion. Single use.

ominous-wind.name: Ominous Wind
ominous-wind.description: Deal 8 damage to all enemies. Gain Strength 2. Gain Haste 2.

dazed.name: Dazed
dazed.description: Your mind is foggy. This card does nothing. Vanishes after use.

spectral-form.name: Spectral Form
spectral-form.description: A ghostly veil clings to this Pokmon. Gain Evasion 5. Vanishes after use.

follow-me.name: Follow Me
follow-me.description: Gain 5 Block. Apply Taunt 2 to self (can only play attack cards).

sweet-kiss.name: Sweet Kiss
sweet-kiss.description: A sweet kiss applies Provoke 2 and Enfeeble 1 to an enemy.

fury-cutter.name: Fury Cutter
fury-cutter.description: Hit 3 times for 2 damage each. (Front row).

mystical-fire.name: Mystical Fire
mystical-fire.description: Deal 7 damage. Apply Burn 1. Apply Enfeeble 1.

lava-plume.name: Lava Plume
lava-plume.description: Deal 8 damage to the front row. Apply Burn 2.

scorch.name: Scorch
scorch.description: Deal 14 damage (+1 per Burn stack on target). Apply Burn 2.

heat-wave.name: Heat Wave
heat-wave.description: Deal 14 damage to entire front row (+2 per Burn stack on target).

blast-burn.name: Blast Burn
blast-burn.description: Deal 45 damage (+2 per card in your Vanished pile).

burn-up.name: Burn Up
burn-up.description: Deal 12 damage. Remove your Fire type for the rest of battle. (Front row).

eruption.name: Eruption
eruption.description: Deal up to 35 damage to all enemies. Scales with user's current HP.

burning-jealousy.name: Burning Jealousy
burning-jealousy.description: Deal 22 damage (+2 per buff stack on the target).

heat-crash.name: Heat Crash
heat-crash.description: Deal up to 26 damage, scaled by user/target weight ratio (max 2x). (Front row).

overheat.name: Overheat
overheat.description: Deal 33 damage to a column. Apply Enfeeble 6 to self. Vanish.
